general.description: This panel defines some global settings for the alarm.

disarm_after_trigger.heading: Disarm after trigger
disarm_after_trigger.description: After trigger time has expired, disarm the alarm instead of returning to armed state.

enable_mqtt.heading: Enable MQTT
enable_mqtt.description: Allow the alarm panel to be controlled through MQTT.

enable_master.heading: Enable alarm master
enable_master.description: Creates an entity for controlling all areas simultaneously.

modes.title: Modes
modes.description: This panel can be used to set up the arm modes of the alarm.

modes.armed_away: Armed away will be used when all people left the house. All doors and windows allowing access to the house will be guarded, as well as motion sensors inside the house.
modes.armed_home: Armed home (also known as armed stay) will be used when setting the alarm while people are in the house. All doors and windows allowing access to the house will be guarded, but not motion sensors inside the house.
modes.armed_night: Armed night will be used when setting the alarm before going to sleep. All doors and windows allowing access to the house will be guarded, and selected motion sensors (downstairs) in the house.
modes.armed_vacation: Armed vacation can be used as an extension to the armed away mode in case of absence for longer duration. The delay times and trigger responses can be adapted (as desired) to being distant from home.
modes.armed_custom_bypass: An extra mode for defining your own security perimeter.

status.heading: Status
status.description: Controls whether the alarm can be armed in this mode.

exit_delay.heading: Exit delay
exit_delay.description: When arming the alarm, within this time period the sensors will not trigger the alarm yet.

entry_delay.heading: Entry delay
entry_delay.description: Delay time until the alarm is triggered after one of the sensors is activated.

trigger_time.heading: Trigger time
trigger_time.description: Time during which the alarm will remain in the triggered state after activation.

mqtt.title: MQTT configuration
mqtt.description: This panel can be used for configuration of the MQTT interface.

state_topic.heading: State topic
state_topic.description: Topic on which state updates are published

event_topic.heading: Event topic
event_topic.description: Topic on which alarm events are published

command_topic.heading: Command topic
command_topic.description: Topic which Alarmo listens to for arm/disarm commands.

require_code.heading: Require code
require_code.description: Require the code to be sent with the command.

use_entry_delay.heading: Use entry delay

allow_open.heading: Allow open after arming
